question: Which among the following temples having wall inscriptions on which stories of Mahabharata and the Ramayana are inscripted ?
explanation: The Vijayanagar rulers created their own architecture style \"Provida style\" that plays a lot of emphasis on piers and pillars. They had inscribed the tales from Ramayana and Mahabharata on the various temple that they have established viz. Vithalswami Temple and Hazari temple at Humpi at Karanataka.
